verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him out of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H120>them<s%>, When any man of you <S%H7126>offereth<s%> an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> your <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, even of the <S%H1241>herd<s%> and of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>.

If his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a <S%H7133>burnt-offering<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd<s%>, he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>: he <S%H7522>shall<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> it at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, that he may be accepted <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>; and it shall be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for him to make atonement for <S%H3722>him<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H1121>bullock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, shall <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that is at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.
And he shall <S%H6584>flay<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and <S%H5408>cut<s%> it into its <S%H5409>pieces<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and lay <S%H6086>wood<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon the <S%H784>fire<s%>;

and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, shall <S%H6186>lay<s%> the <S%H7218>pieces<s%>, the head, and the <S%H6309>fat<s%>, in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire<s%> which is upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

but its <S%H7130>inwards<s%> and its <S%H3767>legs<s%> shall he <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>. And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the whole on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And if his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, of the <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, or of the <S%H5795>goats<s%>, for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>; he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> it on the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5408>cut<s%> it into its <S%H5409>pieces<s%>, with its <S%H7218>head<s%> and its <S%H6309>fat<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall lay them in <S%H6186>order<s%> on the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire<s%> which is upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

but the <S%H7130>inwards<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs<s%> shall he <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>. And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H6999>whole<s%>, and burn it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: it is a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And if his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> of <S%H5775>birds<s%>, then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of <S%H8449>turtle-doves<s%>, or of <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> it unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and wring <S%H4454>off<s%> its <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>; and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof shall be drained <S%H4680>out<s%> on the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>;

and he shall take <S%H5493>away<s%> its <S%H4760>crop<s%> with the <S%H5133>filth<s%> <S%H7993>thereof<s%>, and cast it <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the east <S%H6924>part<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H1880>ashes<s%>:

and he shall <S%H8156>rend<s%> it by the <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H914>thereof<s%>, but shall not divide it asunder. And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, upon the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is upon the <S%H784>fire<s%>: it is a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
